edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure
Class MessageLogger

java.lang.Object
  edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.MessageLogger

public class MessageLogger
extends Object

An object which standardizes the logging of errors and warnings across the project. Note that each logger's disk writing is disabled until you call its beginWritingToDisk() method.

Constructor Summary
MessageLogger()
          Constructs an ErrorLogger object.
MessageLogger(boolean alsoLogToStdOut)
          Constructs an ErrorLogger object and specifies whether to print the log to the standard output.
 
Method Summary
 void beginWritingToDisk()
           
 void continueWritingToDisk()
          Enables disk writing once again, and writes whatever backlog has been generated to the disk.

          Turns off disk writes until you call continueWritingToDisk().

Constructor Detail

MessageLogger

public MessageLogger()
Constructs an ErrorLogger object. By default, the log is not written to the standard output and the log is not written to disk.

MessageLogger

public MessageLogger(boolean alsoLogToStdOut)
Constructs an ErrorLogger object and specifies whether to print the log to the standard output.

Parameters:
alsoLogToStdOut - TRUE if the log should also be sent to the standard output

getPrettifiedList

public static String getPrettifiedList(List l)
Gets a prettified string version of a list. Useful for outputting the contents of the list to the log.

Parameters:
l - The list to prettify
Returns:
A string version of the list, with newlines and tabs inserted as appropriate.

beginWritingToDisk

public void beginWritingToDisk()

delayWritingToDisk

public void delayWritingToDisk()
Turns off disk writes until you call continueWritingToDisk(). Useful for getting around bugs in the underlying file system writer.

continueWritingToDisk

public void continueWritingToDisk()
Enables disk writing once again, and writes whatever backlog has been generated to the disk.
